wtf...it works. Ok folks here is how i did it (nothing special,just a bit of guessing).
People said that FADE kicks in when it recognises invalid CDkey for the specific DVD-rom.Then i thought,maybe it just kicks in because it recognised the emulation software etc. ... so i disabled all the emulation options on DAEMON TOOLS, fired up YASU and launched.

When you go to training,sure enaugh the FADE kicked in.BUT,i reloaded my savegame and continued to the spot FADE kicked in. NO FADE.
Okay i said "maybe because i didnt play long enaugh". I start the campaign and VOILA'! No FADE whatsoever. Lucky? Maybe... but i like to think its my method that did this :) In any case, i suggest you try and see.As i said,nothing special,just a bit of guessing.
